item.description:
I ran this one last year. It's a nice course and there's a great party with food and beer afterward.

You can download an application or register online. They allow you to register the day of the event as well.

As the event gets closer I'll figure out a meeting place for before and after the race. It will probably be somewhere in the fenced in Parking area where the parking is.

Note that the race time is 11:00am but we'll be meeting well before that time to warm up and get to the starting line.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Doyle's 14th Annual Emerald Necklace Road Race
